headline: Raymond James: ‘Copper seasonal weakness offers attractive long-term entry point’
summary: Investing.com -- Raymond James analysts told investors in a note on Tuesday that copper’s “negative seasonality in October” historically offers “an attractive entry point” ahead of a stronger period from November through April.

headline: Does Freeport-McMoRan’s 8.6% Rally Signal a Shift After Recent Volatility in 2025?
summary: If you have been watching Freeport-McMoRan, you know it has not been dull. Just in the last week, the stock climbed 8.6%, bouncing back from a rougher stretch over the past month. Yes, shares dropped 13.0% in the last 30 days and are still down 19.4% over the past year. If you widen the lens, Freeport-McMoRan is up 44.0% over three years and an impressive 155.4% across five. That kind of history makes any investor wonder if this is a moment to buy, sell, or just sit tight. Some of this recent...

headline: Freeport-McMoRan (FCX) Is Considered a Good Investment by Brokers: Is That True?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in Freeport-McMoRan (FCX). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?
